issue.title: [C++][FlightRPC] Add example of registering gRPC service on a Flight server
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14440](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14440). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some applications may want to use gRPC in conjunction with Flight to benefit from gRPC's tooling. This is fairly straightforward to do in Java, not possible in Python, and possible in gRPC but needs some demonstration.

This may also be good to have as a cookbook example.
